description:
A new radio show starring the two high schooler voice actresses Utatane Yasumi and Yugure Yuhi who coincidentally are in the same class has started. The show is known for its cozy atmosphere, but Yasumi has a huge secret. Yasumi is actually a gyaru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuhi and Yasumi Can`t Keep It Hidden?
Yuuhi to Yasumi wa Kakushi Kirenai?
夕陽とやすみは隠しきれない?
